section.8: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa'd ibn AbuWaqqas: (The narrator Qutaibah said: This tradition has been narrated by Sa'id b. Abu Sa'id in my collection): The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: He who does not chant the Qur'an is not one of us
